verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* reviewed \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* thousands.

\w He|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s brother Abishai \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* Ittai \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w surely|strong="H3318"\w* \w march|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* pleaded, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w pay|strong="H7760"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w attention|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*. \w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w care|strong="H7760"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w worth|strong="H3644"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* thousand \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*.\f + \fr 18:3 \ft Two Hebrew manuscripts, some LXX manuscripts, and Vulgate; most Hebrew manuscripts care; for now there are ten thousand like us\f* \w It|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w support|strong="H5826"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.”

“\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w seems|strong="H3190"\w* \w best|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w while|strong="H5975"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* marched \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* thousands.

\w Now|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, Abishai, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Ittai, “Treat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* Absalom gently \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w sake|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w regarding|strong="H5921"\w* Absalom.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* David’s \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* engage \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Ephraim.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5062"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*—\w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w spread|strong="H6327"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w countryside|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* devoured \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5414"\w* Absalom \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w mule|strong="H6505"\w* \w when|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w met|strong="H7122"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mule|strong="H6505"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w thick|strong="H7730"\w* \w branches|strong="H7730"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* oak,\f + \fr 18:9 \ft Or large terebinth or very great tree; similarly in verses 10 and 14\f* Absalom’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tree. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w mule|strong="H6505"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w going|strong="H5674"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* suspended \w in|strong="H5921"\w* midair.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* men \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H2009"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* just \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Absalom \w hanging|strong="H8518"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* oak tree!”

“\w You|strong="H5414"\w* just \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*!” \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* exclaimed. “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w right|strong="H2009"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*? \w I|strong="H5414"\w* would \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 18:11 \ft 10 shekels is approximately 4 ounces or 114 grams of silver.\f* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* warrior’s \w belt|strong="H2290"\w*!”

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* replied, “\w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 18:12 \ft 1,000 shekels is approximately 25.1 pounds or 11.4 kilograms of silver.\f* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* raise \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abishai \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ittai, ‘\w Protect|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* Absalom \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sake|strong="H5921"\w*.\f + \fr 18:12 \ft A few Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts Whoever you may be, protect the young man Absalom. or Let no one touch the young man Absalom.\f*’

If \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* jeopardized \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \f + \fr 18:13 \ft Or If I had dealt treacherously against his life\f*—\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w hidden|strong="H3582"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*—\w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* abandoned \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* declared, “\w I|strong="H3651"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* going \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*!” \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w spears|strong="H7626"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w thrust|strong="H8628"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w through|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Absalom \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* oak tree.

\w And|strong="H5288"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H5288"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s \w armor|strong="H3627"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5437"\w* Absalom, \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* broke \w off|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w restrained|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* Absalom, \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* \w pit|strong="H6354"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* piled \w a|strong="H3068"\w* huge mound \w of|strong="H5921"\w* stones \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. Meanwhile, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* home.

\w During|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w*, Absalom \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4678"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w preserve|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4678"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Absalom’s \w Monument|strong="H3027"\w*. David Mourns for Absalom

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* Ahimaaz \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* said, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H1319"\w* \w news|strong="H1319"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenged|strong="H8199"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* replied, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w good|strong="H1319"\w* \w news|strong="H1319"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H2088"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*.” \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H4428"\w* \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w*.

Ahimaaz \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, \w however|strong="H4672"\w*, persisted \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, “Regardless \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* behind \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w*!” “\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,” \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* replied, “\w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3254"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w want|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w*, \w since|strong="H5750"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H1309"\w*?”

“\w No|strong="H1961"\w* matter \w what|strong="H4100"\w*, \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w want|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w*!” \w he|strong="H4100"\w* replied. “\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w*!” Joab told \w him|strong="H1870"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* Ahimaaz \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w plain|strong="H3603"\w* \f + \fr 18:23 \ft That is, the plain of the Jordan\f* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w outran|strong="H7323"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w between|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gateway|strong="H8179"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w* alone.
